title: Mini Web Framework
description: Build a minimal web framework with routing and views that mimics Django's URL dispatch system.
instructions: Create a Router class that maps URLs to view functions and handles request dispatching with parameter extraction.

hints.text: **Hint:** In the `route` decorator, convert the pattern to regex using `re.sub()` to replace `<int:name>` with `(?P<name>\d+)`. Store the compiled regex, methods, and handler. In `dispatch`, loop through routes and use `re.match()` to find matches.

commonMistakes.mistake: Not checking HTTP method after matching path
commonMistakes.consequence: Wrong handler called or security bypass
commonMistakes.correction: First match the path, then verify the method is allowed for that route
